attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I 'd sincerely like, the government, to: help me to: 'Put my 'vision's' into action, which, in turn will Benefit the Economy.  I hope to do such -things, as encourage 'Michael Ellam' to: have 'Emapthy' with me and therefore, to: supt. my work's.
  I'm sure that all of my family, friend's and relative's, will also supt. me, in encouraging the govt., to help me.  Although this is a 'personal Issue' and i therefore, don't know how many members, of the 'General Population', will supt. me with this aim!!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
